handleCompile() - Method in class codingWizard.learningstagepackage.LearningSController

Exits the code.

Loads the current lecture with the lectureID.

Logs into the account and directs to selection stage
handleLogout() - Method in class codingWizard.courseselectionpackage.SelectionSController
Logs out and goes to the main page.
handleLogout() - Method in class codingWizard.learningstagepackage.LearningSController
Logs out and returns to the main stage.
handleNextButtonClick() - Method in class codingWizard.learningstagepackage.LearningSController
Opens up the next lecture for the user and adds the points.

Resizes the coding area.
handleSignUp() - Method in class codingWizard.signuppackage.SignUpSController
Checks if the password fields' contents match and then if the username is unique.
handleSkip() - Method in class codingWizard.learningstagepackage.LearningSController
Skips the current lecture by issuing a dialog.
handleSubmit() - Method in class codingWizard.examstagepackage.ExamSController
Calculates the points the user earned and disables the button.

Updates the user's info from the database.
